doc.title: 201 Belmont
doc.plot: 201 Belmont is a gorgeous house in a beautiful neighborhood and whose owner, Robert Teuer, is in need of a house sitter. Sophie and Dylan have been married and living with her parents for the past 6 months. It looks like a perfect match. When the young couple move into the house it seems like paradise for a while until a ghost from the past begins to try to warn them of eminent danger. Also their every move seems to be watched by a large sinister man and a camera happy neighbor. Twist and turns lead down a deadly path as Dillon and Sophie try to unravel the mystery surrounding the disappearance of Robert Teuer's wife and the mishaps of the present.

201 Belmont is a gorgeous house in a beautiful neighborhood and whose owner, Robert Teuer, is in need of a house sitter. Sophie and Dylan have been married and living with her parents for the past 6 months. It looks like a perfect match. When the young couple move into the house it seems like paradise for a while until a ghost from the past begins to try to warn them of eminent danger. Also their every move seems to be watched by a large sinister man and a camera happy neighbor. Twist and turns lead down a deadly path as Dillon and Sophie try to unravel the mystery surrounding the disappearance of Robert Teuer's wife and the mishaps of the present.
